content: @Jay Lyle - The CIMPL 6 "Hello World" tutorial documentation has been updated to fix a couple of syntax-related content bugs. http://standardhealthrecord.org/cimpl-doc/cimpl6Tutorial_helloWorld/ . Also, as a note, use shr-cli version 6.2 in order to compile it. Feel free to reach out if you have questions or run into further issues. cc: @Mark Kramer
